mysteryTeasers: The simulation knows when you're watching...
Eun-Mi's laptop contains more than business files.
Harvey's memories aren't entirely his own.
The revenue counter hides a darker truth.
The exit button was never meant to work.
Some choices echo across multiple playthroughs.
The real Harvey might still be somewhere else.

playerTestimonials.author: HorrorFan92
playerTestimonials.text: This game made me question everything about digital consciousness and human ethics. Haunting.

playerTestimonials.author: VisualNovelLover
playerTestimonials.text: The writing is exceptional. Every character feels real and their motivations are complex.

playerTestimonials.author: PhilosophyGamer
playerTestimonials.text: SHROOMYCHRIST has created something that transcends typical horror. It's philosophical art.

playerTestimonials.author: IndieHunter
playerTestimonials.text: Found 6 secrets so far. The hidden layer of storytelling is incredible. Must play multiple times.

achievements.name: Digital Tourist
achievements.description: Complete your first playthrough of Human Expenditure Program

achievements.name: Truth Seeker
achievements.description: Discover 5 hidden secrets within Harvey's simulation

achievements.name: Path Explorer
achievements.description: Experience 3 different endings to Harvey's story

achievements.name: Digital Detective
achievements.description: Uncover all 12 secrets hidden in the simulation

achievements.name: Fate Controller
achievements.description: Witness all 5 possible endings for Harvey's consciousness
